name: Bot-Co: Jam Edition - ReUpload
description:
My entry for my first ever game jam! The theme for the Indie Tales game jam is "One Room".

Description: Bot-Co is a robot manufacturing company and you play as a robot who is going through the final QA process and must pass a series of tests before you can be sold. This Jam was AWESOME! Tons left to fix and add to this game, but a good proof of concept for the mechanics I was looking at.

Controls Keyboard

A - Left

D - Right

Q - Rotate Level Left

E - Rotate Level Right

R - Reload Level

Controller

Left Analog Stick - Move

A - Jump

Left Bumper- Rotate Level Left

Right Bumper - Rotate Level Right

Y - Reload Level
